name: isnackable-site
description: A personal site created with Gatsby as the frontend framework and Sanity.io and the headless content management system.

scripts.build-studio: lerna bootstrap && cd studio && yarn run build
scripts.build-web: lerna bootstrap && (cd studio && SANITY_AUTH_TOKEN=$SANITY_DEPLOY_STUDIO_TOKEN yarn run graphql-deploy) && (cd web && yarn run build)

author: ISnackable
